alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Oneida; Vilas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 5:02PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Scattered thunderstorms will impact portions of Lincoln, Vilas and Oneida Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 502 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking scattered thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles east of Marenisco to 7 miles south of Boulder Junction to near Tripoli. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph, pea size hail and brief heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Scattered thunderstorms will be near... Rainbow Flowage around 515 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Tomahawk, Tripoli, Manitowish Waters, Boulder Junction, Eagle River, Gilbert, Sayner, Star Lake, St. Germain and Phelps. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
